Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I build this giant spacecraft I wanted to launch into outerspace, the launcher part of this rocket is completely stock. There are only kethane parts and some other usefull things(MechJeb) on the spacecraft itself. This first time I launched it it failed badly.

But I did manage to get this complete selfsuporting spacecraft in space and off to Jool later on to refuel on Pol. Ill upload another video about that later on. I do have a nice screen here tho:

http://postimg.org/image/4i7tr1bef/full/

I am now designing probes a car-like device and a kethane spaceplane to take with me on the 4 docking ports.

Here is my first launch:

Let me know what you think =) And ill upload a new video later on. Enjoy =)
